notes.LCP: Largest Contentful Paint - measures loading performance
notes.FCP: First Contentful Paint - measures perceived load speed
notes.CLS: Cumulative Layout Shift - measures visual stability
notes.TTI: Time to Interactive - measures when page becomes fully interactive
notes.TTFB: Time to First Byte - measures server response time
notes.INP: Interaction to Next Paint - measures responsiveness (replaces FID)
